programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Cayetano in Action with Boy Abunda
programme.desc: Senator Alan Peter Cayetano and host Boy Abunda engage in insightful conversations on current events, social issues, and interviews with various guests. The show combines thought-provoking discussions with entertainment, offering diverse perspectives on important topics.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: LIVE Ted Failon DJ Cha Cha Sa Radyo 5
Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Robin Good, Sugod Nang Sugod
programme.desc: Jimmy Santos was the outlaw Robin Good, who stole from the rich to give to the poor. Unlike the swashbuckling hero of the Sherwood Forest legend though, Robin Good was an inept and bumbling coward who could not seem to do anything right.

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Patron
programme.desc: Petras Guerrero (Dante Varona) is called \"Patron\" by the residents of Sacramento with good reason. He uses his police badge to kill vicious criminals, settle disputes and give money to the needy.

programme.title: Lipa \"Arandia\" Massacre
programme.desc: In the movie, Vilma played the role of Helen Arandia, who was brutally murdered along with her two daughters in Lipa, Batangas. The movie is not a massacre movie per se but which main thrust is on the beautiful love story of the couple.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Iyong Kandungan
programme.desc: Ramona (Vivian Velez) is ecstatic when she marries Rommel (Ronaldo Valdez). But Ramona remains a virgin wife as Rommel turns out to be a closet homosexual with a boyfriend, Alex (Mark Gil).

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Duplikado
programme.desc: One look. Two people. One name. Two destinies. Fate separated them on the very day they were born.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Babangon Ako't Dudurugin Kita
programme.desc: Via and Alfred were kindred souls. They would do anything to get what they wanted no matter what the cost. He wanted a future in politics. She came from a political family who wanted to continue wielding power. They were made for each other.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Rosalie 19: Reyna Ng Bocaue
programme.desc: For many years, Monette has raised her daughter on her earnings as a bold dancer. But now that she is old, she finds herself ousted as the club's main attraction. Instead, she finds out her daughter Rosalie (Ilonah Jean) is taking her place as queen of the girls joints. But, one by one, Rosalie's enemies are found dead including the corrupt club owner and Monette's lustful boyfriend.

programme.title: Anak Ng Lupa
programme.desc: Hector learns about his parents' tragic past including his father's death at the hands of a traitor. He succeeds in killing Nestong Antok but his son, Ariosto vows to avenge his father's death. Will this vicious cycle of revenge ever end?

programme.title: Ano Ba Talaga Kuya?
programme.desc: Enter dreamland... when Smokey wakes up to a place where characters odd and outlandish lurk after his life, he is comforted by the fact that he'll soon be over it because it's nothing but a dream.

programme.title: Sa Bingit Ng Kamatayan
programme.desc: Susan was about to go on a test flight with her mountaineer buddy, Daniel. They were about to take off when a group of desperados arrived and took them as hostages. Discover how they outlived this plane-crashing experience and got back the millions of pesos from these bad elements.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Captain Barbell (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Teng-Teng is an orphan who works by collecting junk from the streets. One day, as a rewards for his good deeds, he was given the magic barbel, which empowers him to be Captain Barbel.
